title: The Beginning
description: A sports bra good girl or independent scarlet woman? Sasha’s future is secure as the fiancée of a handsome, rich but boring man. Max is gorgeous, wild and makes her feel things she shouldn’t.Gigolo by night, student by day, Max is motivated by providing pleasure for the string of older women who fund his lifestyle. Sparks fly when they meet, and Max becomes obsessed by the naughty lingerie loving girl who resists his charms. How long can Sasha deny what she desires?This prequel to the Call Girls series contains betrayal, smoldering sexual tension, and lessons in physical love.
author: Emma Jaye
